M.G.L. c. 209C.proposition: This Court has jurisdiction under the Massachusetts Probate and Family Court statutes and the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act, M.G.L. c. 209C because the parties and child reside in Massachusetts and the prior custody order was entered by this Court.

Plaintiff requests the Court consider these authorities as applicable.
